permissions: Users can list key results that fall within the KeyResultPolicy scope, which is limited to objectives they are authorized to access.
validation_notes: status must be one of: unknown, not_started, red, yellow, green, completed, scrapped. has-customer-success-responsible-person expects a strict boolean (true or false). is-template expects true or false. owner, objective, and customer-success-responsible-person accept comma-separated IDs.

flags.name: --owner
flags.description: Filter by owner user ID (comma-separated for multiple)

flags.name: --objective
flags.description: Filter by objective ID (comma-separated for multiple)

flags.name: --status
flags.validation: Allowed values: unknown, not_started, red, yellow, green, completed, scrapped.

flags.name: --customer-success-responsible-person
flags.description: Filter by customer success responsible person user ID (comma-separated for multiple)

flags.name: --has-customer-success-responsible-person
flags.description: Filter by whether customer success responsible person is set (true/false)
flags.validation: Strict boolean; allowed values: true, false.
